title: Iheanacho Wants More Man City Action
content:
By Johnny Edward: 
Manchester City youngster Kelechi Iheanacho is keen for more playing time at the Ethiad after he made a cameo appearance on his debut for the Citizens in their 3-0 win against Watford just before the international break. 
With Wilfried Bony facing a race to be fit for this weekend’s clash at Selhurst Park, Iheanacho told mcfc.co.uk that he’s ready to fire if called upon.
